summary: Frontend testing completed for Pages Editor extension in Admin Settings. All 7 requested features verified working: Pages tab with page selector (Accueil, À propos, Contact, FAQ), About page editor with title/subtitle/mission/values/stats sections, Contact page editor with title/email/phone/hours/address fields, FAQ page editor with title/subtitle/search/options, public About page loading settings from API, public Contact page loading settings from API, and public FAQ page with functional search bar loading settings from API.
passed_tests: Admin Settings page loads successfully with Pages tab visible in second row
Pages tab displays page selector with 4 buttons: Accueil, À propos, Contact, FAQ
Accueil (Home) page selected by default shows HomePageEditor with section buttons
À propos page editor displays: En-tête (title, subtitle), Section Mission (title, 3 paragraphs), Section Valeurs (title, 3 values with icons), Section Chiffres (stats toggle, title, 4 stats)

Contact page editor displays: En-tête (title, subtitle), Informations de contact (email, phone, hours, address), Formulaire de contact (toggle, success message, form title), Section Informations supplémentaires (response time toggle, text)
FAQ page editor displays: En-tête (title, subtitle), Configuration FAQ (search toggle, placeholder, categories toggle), Section Contact FAQ (toggle, button text)
Public About page (/a-propos) loads correctly with title 'À propos de World Auto Pro', mission section, values section (Sécurité, Communauté, Qualité), and stats section
Public Contact page (/contact) loads correctly with title 'Contactez-nous', email display, response time section, FAQ link, and contact form
Public FAQ page (/faq) loads correctly with title 'Foire Aux Questions', search bar with placeholder, FAQ categories (Annonces, Paiements, Sécurité, etc.), and contact CTA section
FAQ search functionality works - filtering questions when typing 'paiement' shows only Paiements category
critical_code_review_comments: PagesEditor component correctly implemented in AdminSettings.jsx (lines 498-995)
About.jsx correctly fetches settings from /api/settings and merges with DEFAULTS
Contact.jsx correctly fetches settings from /api/settings and merges with DEFAULTS
FAQ.jsx correctly fetches settings from /api/settings, includes functional search filtering, and merges with DEFAULTS
All pages use proper fallback defaults when API settings are not available
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pages Editor fully tested and working in Admin Settings (/admin/parametres). The Pages tab appears in the second row of tabs. Features include: page selector with 4 buttons (Accueil, À propos, Contact, FAQ), each page has its own editor with customizable fields. Public pages (/a-propos, /contact, /faq) correctly load settings from the /api/settings endpoint and display content accordingly. FAQ page includes a functional search bar that filters questions in real-time. Admin credentials: contact@worldautofrance.com / Admin123!
